thread.title: Golovkin stops Lemieux in 8th round for middleweight title
thread.title_full: Golovkin stops Lemieux in 8th round for middleweight title

title: Golovkin stops Lemieux in 8th round for middleweight title
text:
> Sports Golovkin stops Lemieux in 8th round for middleweight title Gennady Golovkin celebrates defeating David Lemieux in the eighth round of a middleweight fight at Madison Square Garden in New York on Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz)
